name: ShapeOrama Aussie Animals Limited Demo
description:
Hi everyone

This is a playable limited demo of the newly released educational game ShapeOrama Aussie Animals designed for kids aged 4-9.

You can purchase the full copy of this game on iTunes and the Mac App store, or the Android version on Google Play.

Mac App Store Link: https://itunes.apple.com/us/ap...

Visit us on Facebook for updates and future releases of the ShapeOrama series for kids.
